job description:
Salary: DOE
Industry: Footwear & Apparel
What Matters Most:
  • 3-5 years of experience with progressive analysis and problem solving required
  • Proficiency in Oracle Cloud Services Case Management strongly preferred
  • Proficiency in Tableau, MS PowerPoint, and MS Excel, including advanced formulas and charts required
  • Knowledge of SAP, HCM, OM, and PA required
  • Background and/or knowledge and passion for the footwear and apparel industry
Your New Role:
  • Performs daily analysis on ER Case Data to identify data integrity issues
  • Performs actions to resolve data integrity gaps and to ensure reporting is correct and complete
  • Utilizes multiple applications to extract data, perform audits, and create metrics reports according to schedule
  • Creates and maintains documentation of audits and reports
  • Participates in efforts to identify areas of potential process or data improvements and reports them to the Global Process & Tools Manager
Your New Organization:

This Beaverton-based industry leader in global footwear and apparel is looking for a great Employee Relations Data Analyst to join their team. The brand is at the forefront of product innovation and truly employs the best of the best.
